metrics.name: Average cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event

blocks.text: This dashboard provides an overview of the Issue-to-Resolution process in Jira used in the Process Intelligence Accelerators Team.
It is structured in seven pages taking care of different analysis objectives:
Page 1 (Summary): Overview to get a first picture of the process.
Page 2 (Rework): Analysis of rework cycles within the process.
Page 3 (Cycle Time): Analysis of overall cycle time and for certain parts of the process.
Page 4 (Review): Deep dive into the issue reviews.
Page 5 (Dropouts): Analysis of process dropouts and time spent on those cases.
Page 6 (Variants): Visualization of all process variants and the respective case counts.
Page 7 (Case Table):  A list of case details in order to look further into root causes.
Page 8 (Feedback):  Please use this page to provide feedback or try out new widgets.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.

children.name: Average ticket initial processing time
children.description: Time difference between the first occurrence of 'Change Status to Review' and 'Change Status to In Progress'

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG( 
  (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
     WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Review', 'Change Status to Ready for Review', 'Change Status to In Review')) - 
  (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
     WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress')
) 
FILTER 
  (WHERE event_name
   MATCHES('Change Status to In Progress' 
          -> ('Assign Person to Issue')? 
          -> 'Change Status to Ready for Review')
  )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT COUNT(case_id) 
FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress' ) > 1 )
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue'))) AS "Month when Issue created",
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE event_name MATCHES('Create Issue' -> 'Change Status to To Do')
    ) AS "# Cases"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('month', 
    	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
        WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed'))) AS "Month when Issue Closed",
	COUNT(case_id) 
    FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES(('Change Status to Closed'))) AS "# Cases"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

children.name: % Rejection ratio
children.description: Tickets end with 'Change Status to Rejected'

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) 
FILTER (
	WHERE "ResolutionStatus" LIKE 'Rejected')
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Issue types
children.description: Distribution of issue types for all cases

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) AS "# Case",  "IssueType"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: Tickets reopened after closed/done
children.description: Tickets with events after being closed / done before

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) 
FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES (
      ('Change Status to Done' | 'Change Status to Closed') ~> ('Change Status to To Do'|'Change Status to In Progress')
      )
    )       
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT count(case_id) AS "# Case",  "ResolutionStatus"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "ResolutionStatus" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: Monthly average number of reworks per case

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
DATE_TRUNC('month', 
                   (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
                    WHERE event_name 
                    IN ('Change Status to Closed')
                   )
          ) AS "Month",
AVG(
	(SELECT COUNT(event_name) 
     WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress')
   ) -1 AS "Rework ratio per case" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review')) >1
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

children.name: Average number of rework on issues with rework

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG((
	SELECT count(event_name) 
    WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress'
    )-1)
FILTER (WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review')) >1 )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT COUNT(case_id) 
FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress' ) > 1 )
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Average number of reworks per case
children.description: Average number of rework over all cases

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG((
	SELECT count(event_name) 
    WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress'
    )-1)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

blocks.text: A case with rework is defined with having more than one occurence of the event 'Change Status to in Progress'.  The second occurence will be counted as the first "rework".

children.name: Monthly average time from 'In Progress' to 'Closed'
children.description: Time from status 'In Progress' to 'Closed'

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to Closed')) AS "Month when Issue Closed",
AVG( 
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
    	WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to Closed') 
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress')
    )
FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to In Progress' ~> 'Change Status to Closed') ) AS "Duration"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

children.name: Time for 'In Progress' to first 'Ready for Review'
children.description: Only considering the first time a ticket is 'In Progress'

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress')) AS "Month",
AVG( 
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	WHERE (event_name = 'Change Status to Ready for Review'))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress')
    )
FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to In Progress' ~> 'Change Status to Ready for Review')) AS "# Cases"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

children.name: Average time issue first in 'Ready for Review'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to Ready for Review' ~> 
    						 'Change Status to In Review')

children.name: Average time between first 'In Progress' and 'Ready for Review'
children.description: Time when the issue is first in status 'In Progress'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to In Progress' ~> 
    						 'Change Status to Ready for Review')

children.name: Average time from ticket creation to starting work
children.description: Time the issue is created until first time 'In Progress'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue'))
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Issue' ~> 'Change Status to In Progress')

children.name: Average Flagging Time
children.description: Average time a ticket is flagged (i.e. blocked)

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
		 WHERE event_name = 'Unflag Issue')
      - (SELECT LAST(end_time)
         WHERE event_name = 'Flag Issue')
        )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Average time from 'In Progress' to 'Closed'
children.description: Time from status 'In Progress' to 'Closed'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG( 
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
    	WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to Closed') 
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress')
    )
FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to In Progress' ~> 'Change Status to Closed') )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Average time issue to assign first reviewer

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Assign Reviewer'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to Ready for Review' ~> 
    						 'Change Status to In Review')

children.name: Time from first review to ticket closed
children.description: From first time 'In Review' to 'Closed'

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Review')) AS "Month",
AVG( 
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	WHERE (event_name = 'Change Status to Closed'))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Review')
    )
FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to In Review' ~> 'Change Status to Closed')) AS "# Cases"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

children.name: Average time between ticket assignment and first 'In Progress'
children.description: Time between a person is assigned and when the issue is first in status 'In Progress'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Assign Issue to Person'))
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to To Do' ~> 
    						 'Change Status to In Progress')

children.name: Average time between 'To Do' and 'In Progress'
children.description: Time the issue is in 'To Do' until first time 'In Progress'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to To Do'))
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to To Do' ~> 'Change Status to In Progress')

children.name: Average time to review ticket
children.description: Average time from first 'In Review' to 'Closed'

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
		 WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to Closed')
      - (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
      	 WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Review')
       ) 
FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to In Review' ~> 
    						 'Change Status to Closed')
		)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Assign Reviewer')) AS "Month when Reviewer added",
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
		 WHERE event_name IN ('Assign Reviewer')
        )
      	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
      	   WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))
    ) AS "Duration"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to Ready for Review' ~> ('Assign Reviewer'|'Change Reviewer'))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

children.name: Monthly Average time to review ticket
children.description: Average time from first 'In Review' to 'Closed'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to Closed')) AS "Month",
AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
		 WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to Closed')
      - (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
      	 WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Review')
       ) 
FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to In Review' ~> 
    						 'Change Status to Closed')
		) AS "Duration"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed', 'Change Status to To Do'))) AS "Month when Review completed",
AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
		 WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to Closed'
        )
      	- (SELECT LAST(end_time)
      	   WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Review')
       ) AS "Duration"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to In Review' ~> ('Change Status to To Do' | 'Change Status to Closed'))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

children.name: Average time to review ticket
children.description: Average time from first 'In Review' to 'Closed'

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
		 WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to Closed')
      - (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
      	 WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Review')
       ) 
FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to In Review' ~> 
    						 'Change Status to Closed')
		)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
AVG(
	(SELECT count(event_name) 
    WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Review')
   )
FILTER (WHERE "ResolutionStatus" IS NOT NULL) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Average time issue first in 'Ready for Review'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to Ready for Review' ~> 
    						 'Change Status to In Review')

children.name: Time spent on drop-outs
children.description: Time from 'In Progress' to 'Closed' where resolution is 'Rejected' or 'Won't Do'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed'))) AS "Month when Issue Rejected",
SUM( 
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed')) 
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress')
    ) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES (
    'Change Status to In Progress' ~> 'Change Status to Closed') 
    AND "ResolutionStatus" IN ('Rejected', 'Won''t Do')) AS "Duration"	
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT SUM( 
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
    	WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to Closed') 
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress')
    ) 
FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES (
    'Change Status to In Progress' ~> 'Change Status to Closed') 
    AND "ResolutionStatus" NOT IN ('Done'))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Total Rejection ratio
children.description: Ratio of tickets with resolution status 'Rejected' or 'Won't Do'

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) 
FILTER (
	WHERE "ResolutionStatus" IN ('Rejected', 'Won''t Do'))
/ COUNT(case_id) 
FILTER (
	WHERE "ResolutionStatus" IS NOT NULL)
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Ratio of tickets rejected after starting work

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
(COUNT(case_id) 
FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES (
    'Change Status to In Progress' 
    ~> 'Change Status to Closed') 
    AND "ResolutionStatus" IN ('Rejected')))
/ (
COUNT(case_id) 
FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES (
    'Change Status to In Progress' 
    ~> 'Change Status to Closed') ))
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT count(case_id) AS "# Case",  "ResolutionStatus"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "ResolutionStatus" != 'Done'
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC

selectedVariants: Change Status to Ready for Review

children.name: AVG Time between 'To Do' and 'In Progress'
children.description: How long are tickets laying in around „To Do”? Ideally they should be worked on timely, as they were moved out of the backlog to tackle them

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to To Do'))
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to To Do' ~> 'Change Status to In Progress')

children.name: AVG Time of Tickets in Backlog
children.description: Time the issue is in Backlog

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to To Do'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue'))
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Issue' ~> 'Change Status to To Do')

children.name: AVG Time between 'To Do' and 'In Progress' grouped by IssueType
children.description: How long are tickets laying in around „To Do”? Ideally they should be worked on timely, as they were moved out of the backlog to tackle them

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG ((SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Change Status to In Progress')) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Change Status to To Do'))), "IssueType"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Change Status to To Do' ~> 'Change Status to In Progress')
GROUP BY 2

children.name: AVG in Backlog grouped by IssueType

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG ((SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Change Status to To Do')) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Issue'))), "IssueType"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create Issue' ~> 'Change Status to To Do')
GROUP BY 2

children.name: # Bug Tickets per Month
children.description: We have less then 10 bug tickets per month?

dataSource.query:
SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time))) as Month,
    count(case_id) as "# Bugs"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "IssueType" = 'Bug'
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Task Tickets | AVG Time Review to ticket closed
children.description: Task Tickets | AVG Time Review to ticket closed

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Review')) AS "Month",
AVG( 
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	WHERE (event_name = 'Change Status to Closed'))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Review')
    )
FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to In Review' ~> 'Change Status to Closed')) AS "# Task Tickets"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "IssueType" = 'Task'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1
